Nerangs.ab: az aiia aibi gara tā paiti jime aṣ̌əm vohū sē bār guftan bōy ō ī ātaxš dādan parharišn ruwān gyān kardan wist wacist sē gāh rāyēnīdan

"From aiia aibi gara until paiti jime and one aṣ̌əm vohū, they sould recite it three times. (The rāspīg) has to bring bōy to the fire. He should reckon the frauuaṣ̌i, the souls and the spirits and arrange the twenty stanzas to three verses."
